::Ursa Major::

*She relaxes after hitting the wall and sees the door latch.*

"Gosh, what a dunce I am when I get mad.  Sheesh."

*she lightly chuckles to herself.  She transforms into her bot mode and 
unlocks the door to the chamber and steps out.  She looks around the room.*
